resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78260</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20e60-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szövőgépek a 18. századi Nagy-Britanniában</string>
            <string language="en">Power-looms in the 18. century Great Britain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie-Webstühle im 18. Jahrhundert 
Großbritannien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissance-manches en 18. siècle Grande-Bretagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potência-teares 18. no século Grâ Bretanha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenza-telai 18. nel secolo Gran Bretagna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη-αργαλειοί στο 18, αιώνα Μεγάλη Βρετανία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Potencia-telares en 18. el siglo Gran Bretaña</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ipari forradalom a textiliparban kezdődött. Hogarth korának egyik legjobb "riportere" volt. (W. Hogarth metszete)</string>
            <string language="en">The industrial revolution started in the textile industry. Hogarth was one of the best "reporter" of his age. (Engraving of W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hogarth,  szövőgép,  ipari forradalom,  gépesítés,  </string>
            <string language="en">Hogarth, power-loom, indutrial revolution, engineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die industrielle Revolution begann in der 
Textilindustrie. Hogarth war eins des besten "Reporters" seines 
Alters. (Stich von W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La révolution industrielle a commencé dans 
l'industrie textile. Hogarth était un du meilleur "journaliste"
de son âge. (gravure de W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A volta industrial começou na indústria de 
textile. Hogarth era um do mais melhor "repórter" de sua idade.
(engraving de W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La rivoluzione industriale ha cominciato nella 
industria tessile. Hogarth era uno "del reporter" migliore 
della sua età. (incisione di W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιομηχανική επανάσταση άρχισε στη βιομηχανία 
κλωστοϋφαντουργίας. Το Hogarth ήταν ένας από τον 
καλύτερο "δημοσιογράφο" της ηλικίας του. (Χάραξη Θ*Ω. 
Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La revolución industrial comenzó en la 
industria de textil. Hogarth era uno del mejor "reportero" de su
edad. (grabado de W. Hogarth)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hogarth, Energie-Webstuhl, indutrial Umdrehung, 
führend aus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hogarth, puissance-manche, révolution indutrial, 
machinant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hogarth, potência-tear, volta indutrial, projetando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hogarth, potenza-telaio, giro indutrial, costruente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hogarth, δύναμη-αργαλειός, indutrial επανάσταση, 
εφαρμοσμένη μηχανική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hogarth, potencia-telar, revolución indutrial, 
dirigiendo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>

              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
